history.proof: intros d a la ls hd tl n H. destruct H as [H1 | [H2 H3]]. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: invar_2_1. - sauto qb: on depth: 3use: invar_2_1.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (S n) = true -> rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) n = true \\/ rec_term d a hd n = true /\\ rec_list_terms d la tl n = true" on hypothesis of type "rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) n = true".

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl n H.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl n H. destruct H as [H1 | [H2 H3]]. - left. apply invar_2_1 in H1. apply H1. - right. split. + apply invar_2_1 in H3. apply H3. + apply invar_2_1 in H2. apply H2.
